CatDescriptText: Portion of cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 8, 1947, pg. 2, reads: "Presents Awards - Promotion exercises for the 9-A Class of Herron Hill Junior High School were held last Tuesday at 2 P. M... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man presenting certificates to six students, on stage in Herron Hill Junior High School with sponge painted backdrop with trees
CatSubject_tab: Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Theaters Stage-setting and scenery--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Herron Hill Junior High School (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
